title: Where I download plugin StrongOD 0.3.4.639?
content: I want plugin for OllyDbg - strongOD 0.3.4.639 version. Where I find it for download? Thank for response.

answers_data.content:
I don't know about that version but you can find the latest version (0.4.8.892) here

https://tuts4you.com/download.php?view.2028

For more information about OllyDbg plugin system see this and this

comments.text: Thank you very much. So, how I use it? I thought that will install it, but its only .dll file, so how I get it into OllyDbg? Many thanks.
You should setup your OllyDBG plugin directory and just place the dll in that directory. Olly will load the plugin automagically.
